class ai_flow.workflow.control_edge.ConditionType(value)[source]¶

Bases: str, enum.Enum

SUFFICIENT: Sufficient conditions, as long as one condition is met, the action will be triggered. NECESSARY: Necessary conditions, all conditions are met before the action is triggered.

NECESSARY = 'NECESSARY'¶

class ai_flow.workflow.control_edge.TaskAction(value)[source]¶

Bases: str, enum.Enum

START: Start the job.

RESTART: If the job is running, stop it first and then start it. If the job is not running,just start it.

STOP: Stop the job.

NONE: Do nothing.

NONE = 'NONE'¶
RESTART = 'RESTART'¶

If the job is running, stop it first and then start it. If the job is not running,just start it.

START = 'START'¶

Start the job.

STOP = 'STOP'¶

class ai_flow.workflow.control_edge.ValueCondition(value)[source]¶

Bases: str, enum.Enum

EQUALS: The condition that notification service updates a value which equals to the event value. UPDATED: The condition that notification service has a update operation on the event key which event

value belongs.

EQUALS = 'EQUALS'¶
UPDATED = 'UPDATE'¶
